thread.title: Everything you need to know about Auburn's loss to Arkansas | AL.com
thread.title_full: Everything you need to know about Auburn's loss to Arkansas | AL.com

author: Wesley Sinor | wsinor@al.com
title: Everything you need to know about Auburn's loss to Arkansas | AL.com
text:
Auburn lost a wild game to Arkansas last weekend, falling to the Razorbacks 54-46 in quadruple overtime.
Check out all of AL.com's coverage from Fayetteville with the links below.

• 2-minute drill: Arkansas 54, Auburn 46 (4OT)
